description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. New Air System! Hostile alien life! Multiplayer for up to 16 players! New Mega Terrain!   Build your world in the far reaches of space.  Features an intense lunar survival theme, hostile alien mobs, new weapons, fully scriptable autonomous bots, futuristic tools and tech, a great community and more to come!
description.short: New Air System! Hostile alien life! Multiplayer for up to 16 players! New Mega Terrain!   Build your world in the far reaches of space.
